articles.title: Got $1,000? 2 High-Yield Healthcare Stocks to Buy and Hold Forever
articles.mainIdea: Got $1,000? 2 High-Yield Healthcare Stocks to Buy and Hold Forever
articles.summary: Motley Fool: Got $1,000? 2 High-Yield Healthcare Stocks to Buy and Hold Forever. If you are looking for high yields, this drug maker and this device maker are both worth a deep dive today. Related tickers mentioned: MDT, PFE.

articles.title: Office Introverts Want to Be Understood
articles.mainIdea: Office Introverts Want to Be Understood
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Office Introverts Want to Be Understood. Office introverts want the boss to understand their plight. As quieter employees push workplaces to be more flexible and provide more resources, companies are making more space for introverts, sometimes literally: Bristol-Myers Squibb created a room where introverts can recharge. Companies often cut jobs around the holidays, so you should plan just in case, writes Callum Borchers.

articles.title: Amgen Strikes Drug Pricing Deal With Trump: What Investors Should Know
articles.mainIdea: Amgen Strikes Drug Pricing Deal With Trump: What Investors Should Know
articles.summary: Zacks: Amgen Strikes Drug Pricing Deal With Trump: What Investors Should Know. AMGN signs a pricing deal with the Trump administration, cutting U.S. drug costs, expanding DTC access and securing tariff relief tied to domestic investment. Related tickers mentioned: AMGN, GLAXF, GSK, MRK.
